title: One Bedroom in The Post South Lamar Apartments on S Lamar & Collier
map_address: 1500 s lamar blvd near collier st
posting_body: I'm a Realtor specializing in apartment locating throughout the Austin area.
Please email or call me if you would like to talk about what you are looking for, and to schedule a showing, and look at some of these apartment listings.
I have access to MLS and all apartment pricing to expedite your rental search at no cost to you.
You can see all the Austin area rental listings including condos, homes, townhomes, apartments and duplexes on our website:
Apartment prices vary and fluctuate based on availability.
I can send over accurate pricing and similar properties if inquire.
